titleInfo.title: 817 - 819 Gravier Street (between Carondelet and Baronne Streets)

subject.topic: Norman Mayer & Co. (Firm: New Orleans, La.)

mods.abstract: See also 176231 b - d. The camera appears to stand in an upper floor of a building across from 817 - 819 Gravier Street looking back at the building across Gravier. The negative carries the following typewritten identification: No. 1 August 29 1924 817 - 819 Gravier Street.

titleInfo.title: New Orleans Negative Exposures and Prints, circa 1900-1930

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
